thread.title: Ellen Pompeo: Daniel Craig 'needs a reality check'
thread.title_full: Ellen Pompeo: Daniel Craig 'needs a reality check' - CNN.com

author: Lisa Respers France
title: Ellen Pompeo: Daniel Craig 'needs a reality check'
text:
Story highlights Actress Ellen Pompeo tweets about Daniel Craig's reported remarks on more 007 films Craig recently told publication he wouldn't do another James Bond film But Pompeo concedes that what Craig said may have been taken out of context (CNN) Most actors would be thrilled to have a longstanding gig.
Daniel Craig, perhaps not so much.
At least one fellow performer appeared less than thrilled with Craig's recent reported remarks that he was over playing James Bond .
Ellen Pompeo weighs in on Daniel Craig quitting Bond. "Grey's Anatomy" star Ellen Pompeo tweeted a response to the British actor, who told Time Out London , "I'd rather break this glass and slash my wrists" than think about doing another Bond film.
"I'm over it at the moment," Craig told the publication. "We're done. All I want to do is move on."
Read More Daniel Craig: I'd rather 'slash my wrists' than play James Bond again
"This dude needs a reality check," Pompeo tweeted along with a link to a story about Craig's remarks.
This dude needs a reality check https://t.co/adi4RYRXg3
— Ellen Pompeo (@EllenPompeo) October 8, 2015 But hold on.
One person pointed out on Twitter that Craig's remarks, which were part of a longer interview, may not be what they appear to be. Pompeo conceded that point.
"You are absolutely right!" she tweeted. "I certainly have been there."
You are absolutely right! I certainly have been there https://t.co/3vHte187Em
— Ellen Pompeo (@EllenPompeo) October 8, 2015 It's been almost a decade since Craig took on the role of the suave spy. His latest, "Spectre," is due in U.S. theaters on November 6.
